item.description:
Forwarding from David Emerson of the AFA...

Friday, June 18th, I'll be holding a pubmoot at Delaney's Tap Room in New Haven, CT at 7 PM. I've been out of the loop for a little while, due to some computer problems, but I'm trying to hit the ground running again and get some stuff here in CT happening.

So, if you're looking for some good company, and some good food and drink, feel free to come on down. All are welcome, from veteran Asatruar to the merely Asa-curious, so if your schedule is free, fill it with a pubmoot!

Directions are available at: Delaney's Tap Room

In frith,
Dave

group.name: Connecticut & Western Mass Asatru Meetup Group

item.name: New Haven Pubmoot
